description:
High forcing (ScenarioMIP SSP5-85) future scenario (2015-2050) coupled ocean atmosphere simulations at high and standard resolution.
For optimal comparison between models aerosol concentrations would be preferable and not emissions.
At least one ensemble member at high resolution, minimum atmosphere 25-50 km at mid-latitudes and ocean resolution of 0.25 degrees, and a minimum of daily coupling between ocean and atmosphere.
At least one ensemble member at standard model resolution.
keywords: HighResMIP, Tier 2, coupled, high forcing scenario
rationale: Extension to the Historical coupled simulations.

requirements.description: Future scenario, begin in 2015 and run for 36 years
requirements.label: 2015-2050 36yrs

requirements.description:
Impose RCP8.5 forcing.
Represents the high end of the range of plausible future forcing pathways.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP8.5
requirements.label: RCP85 Forcing

requirements.description: At least two simulations, one at high resolution (minimum 25-50 km at mid-latitudes), and one at the standard model resolution
requirements.keywords: high resolution, standard resolution, at least two members
requirements.label: HighAndStandardResolution

requirements.description: Initialisation is a continuation from the end of the HighResMIP hist-1950 simulation.  To provide continuity between simulations.
requirements.label: hist-1950 Initialisation

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model
requirements.label: AOGCM Configuration

requirements.description: Minimum daily coupling between ocean and atmosphere.  Preferably more frequent, 3hr or 1hr.
requirements.label: Daily Coupling
